faq.title: FAQs
faq.subtitle: Any questions left? Get answers to all of your questions

faq_questions.title: Do you offer mobile-responsive design?
faq_questions.content: Absolutely! All of our websites are designed to be responsive, ensuring a seamless user experience on desktops, tablets, and smartphones.

faq_questions.title: How long does it take to design and develop a website?
faq_questions.content: The timeline for a web project can vary based on the complexity and the requirements of the project. However, we work closely with our clients to meet their deadlines and ensure a smooth delivery.

faq_questions.title: Can you redesign my existing website?
faq_questions.content: Absolutely! We can evaluate your current website, identify areas for improvement, and work on a redesign to enhance its functionality and aesthetics.

faq_questions.title: How much does a website cost?
faq_questions.content: The cost of a website depends on various factors including the complexity, features, and the amount of custom development required. We provide a detailed estimate after understanding your project requirements.

faq_questions.title: What makes your agency unique?
faq_questions.content: Our commitment to quality, client satisfaction, and the use of modern web development technologies sets us apart. We work closely with our clients to ensure their vision is brought to life through our digital solutions.

faq_questions.title: What is the process for designing and developing a website?
faq_questions.content: Our process begins with a consultation to understand your goals and requirements. We then move on to design mockups, followed by development, testing, and finally, launch. We ensure to keep our clients involved and updated throughout the process.

faq_questions.title: How many revisions are included?
faq_questions.content: During the design process, you can submit as many revisions until you are satisfied. However, once we find the right design and start developing the website, we will no longer go in the design process.

faq_questions.title: How do we communicate during the website development process?
faq_questions.content: We utilize Trello for project management and communication during the website development process. Through a dedicated project board, you can track progress, provide feedback, and interact with our team in real time.

faq_questions.title: Are there any refunds if I dont like the service?
faq_questions.content: Due to the high quality nature of the work, there will be no refunds issued.
